## Why was data driven decision making (3DM) useful in this business case?

Major Paul Lester, Director of Research for the Office of the Deputy Under Secretary of the Army and his team has built an enormous database for securely and anonymously analyzing and experimenting with that data to improve life of soldiers. (Lester, 2013)

## How did the organization apply 3DM?

They have run analyses on over 16,000 soldiers entering basic training to measure psychological health and resilience throughout the training. Get clear picture where each and every soldier stand. (Psychol,2013)

## What can the organization do with 3DM that they couldnâ€™t do before?

army has data of soldiers and their family members also. select the right person to train can reduce PTSD. reduce healthcare utilization and military healthcare budget (Psychol,2013)
